Name: Tower ships
About the game: Tower Ships is clearly a tower defense game but the mechanics are significantly different to classic tower defense games as the towers are spaceships. The core of this game is about managing these ships location, rotation, power and special ability instead of building new towers. Between levels you expand your fleet and reoutfit the ships with better weapons and shields. Key features Movable towers (ships), therefore you will need to manage these ships location, rotation Route power to different ship systems and use special ability on the ships Expand your fleet (7 different ships) and reoutfit the ships with better weapons (8 different weapons) and shields 30 levels
